summary: A retexture for the wonderful Oblivion Gates Mod by MCR.
descriptionHtml:
I've always loved the Oblivion Gates Mod that adds ruined gates around Skyrim. I've never really liked the texture though. They seemed to stand out of the landscape as if they'd been directly imported from another video game...
Well no more! Now they stand out of the landscape as if they were imported from another dimension instead. They rouse my curiosity instead of my artistic sensibilities.

This is just a simple HD retexture (complete with new normals) to make the gates dark and brooding. They are almost black (depending on your ENB they may actually BE black), with a purplish tinge and extra texturing on the red spikes.

The original mod can be found here:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22369/?]Oblivion Gates[/url]

If you don't like my texture the original creator of the Oblivion Gate resource did provide some alternatives which you should check out:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18957/?]Oblivion Gates Modders Resource[/url]

Feed back is as always, welcome. :)

author: Kidhedera
